aatrox.lore: Aatrox is a Darkin bruiser who excels in extended fights. With sweeping blade strikes, displacement, and his demonic form, he dominates melee teamfights.

passive.name: Blood Well
passive.description: Periodically empowers his next basic attack to deal bonus physical damage in a cone and heal based on damage dealt.
notes: Cooldown reduced by attacks and abilities

spells.name: The Darkin Blade
spells.description: Aatrox swings his blade three times, each with a different hit shape. Hitting with the blade's edge deals increased damage and knocks up.

spells.name: Infernal Chains
spells.description: Aatrox lashes forward, damaging and slowing the first champion hit. If the target stays in the zone, they are pulled to the center and damaged again.
notes: Targets can escape by leaving the zone

spells.name: Umbral Dash
spells.description: Aatrox dashes, briefly increasing self-healing. Stores two charges. Passive: attacks and Q heal him when hitting champions.
notes: Can be used during Q to land sweetspots

spells.name: World Ender
spells.description: Aatrox unleashes his demonic form, gaining AD, Move Speed, and amplified healing. Takedowns extend the duration and heal him heavily.

ahri.lore: Ahri is a mobile mage-assassin who charms and bursts targets. Her ultimate grants agile dashes to engage, reposition, or escape.

passive.name: Essence Theft
passive.description: Abilities generate essence; on reaching stacks Ahri heals. Champion takedowns grant additional essence and refresh her ultimate casts.
notes: Takedowns grant instant healing and an extra ult dash

spells.name: Orb of Deception
spells.description: Ahri sends her orb forward and pulls it back. Outbound deals magic damage; return deals true damage.
notes: Grants movement speed while the orb travels
Can hit targets twice if centered

spells.name: Fox-Fire
spells.description: Ahri summons three flames that seek nearby enemies. Multiple flames can strike the same champion.

spells.name: Charm
spells.description: Ahri blows a kiss that charms, damaging and causing the first enemy hit to walk harmlessly towards her. Empowers her other abilities.

spells.name: Spirit Rush
spells.description: Ahri dashes up to three times, firing essence bolts at nearby enemies. Champion takedowns extend the window for additional dashes.

akali.lore: Akali is a nimble assassin who strikes with mobility and burst. Her shroud enables creative engages and escapes, while dashes close gaps.

passive.name: Assassin's Mark
passive.description: Hitting an enemy with an ability creates a ring around them. Leaving the ring empowers Akali's next melee attack with bonus range, damage, and movement speed.

spells.name: Five Point Strike
spells.description: Akali throws five kunai in a cone, dealing magic damage. Enemies at the edge take increased damage and are briefly slowed.

spells.name: Twilight Shroud
spells.description: Akali creates a smoke shroud, becomes obscured, regenerates energy, and gains movement speed entering or leaving the shroud.
notes: Attacking or casting briefly reveals her

spells.name: Shuriken Flip
spells.description: Akali backflips and throws a shuriken, marking the first enemy hit. Reactivate to dash to the marked target and deal damage again.

spells.name: Perfect Execution
spells.description: Akali dashes forward, slightly knocking aside enemies (1st cast). After a short delay, dash again through a target dealing high damage, increased vs low-health enemies (2nd cast).

anivia.lore: Anivia controls fights with zoning and pick tools. Her wall and stun enable precise setups, while her storm controls space in extended skirmishes.

passive.name: Rebirth
passive.description: Upon taking fatal damage, Anivia transforms into an egg at her location. If the egg survives, she is revived with health.

spells.name: Flash Frost
spells.description: Anivia sends a slow-moving projectile that chills and slows. Reactivating or reaching max range detonates it, stunning and dealing damage.

spells.name: Crystallize
spells.description: Anivia creates an ice wall that blocks movement, shapes terrain, and grants brief vision.

spells.name: Frostbite
spells.description: Anivia blasts a target for magic damage. Chilled enemies take double damage.
notes: Empowered if Q or R recently hit

spells.name: Glacial Storm
spells.description: Anivia summons a storm that slows and deals magic damage per second. Reactivate to end the storm.
notes: Larger and more ticks at the center

caitlyn.lore: Caitlyn is a long-range marksman who controls lanes with range, traps, and precise headshots. She keeps enemies at bay and finishes fights with her sniper ultimate.

passive.name: Headshot
passive.description: Caitlyn's attacks periodically deal bonus damage. Trapped or netted enemies are marked for an empowered headshot.

spells.name: Piltover Peacemaker
spells.description: Caitlyn fires a piercing shot that damages all enemies in a line, dealing reduced damage after the first target.

spells.name: Yordle Snap Trap
spells.description: Caitlyn places a trap that roots the first enemy to spring it, grants vision, and marks them for a headshot.
notes: Great for chokes and ally combos

spells.name: 90 Caliber Net
spells.description: Caitlyn fires a net that slows and knocks her backward. The recoil can be used to cross walls.

spells.name: Ace in the Hole
spells.description: Caitlyn locks onto a champion and fires a long-range shot that deals heavy damage but can be blocked by other champions.

lux.lore: Lux is a long-range mage blending crowd control and shields. She can decide fights with her massive light laser.

passive.name: Illumination
passive.description: Lux's abilities mark enemies with light energy. Her next attack or ability consumes the mark for bonus magic damage.
notes: Allies can help consume the mark

spells.name: Light Binding
spells.description: Lux fires a light sphere that roots up to two enemies and deals damage.

spells.name: Prismatic Barrier
spells.description: Lux throws her wand like a boomerang. Allies hit gain a shield that is strengthened on the return.
notes: Shields on both outbound and return
Can hit all allies along the path

spells.name: Lucent Singularity
spells.description: Lux creates a light zone that slows enemies and explodes after a short delay. She can detonate early.

spells.name: Final Spark
spells.description: Lux channels briefly and fires a huge laser across a long distance, dealing heavy damage and triggering Illumination.
